cause.description:
No money needed to believe!
In Jeff Tedford We Trust!
University of California GOLDEN BEARS to Pasadena on New Years Day or Bust!
SUPPORT OUR PLAYERS AT CALBEARS.COM!
GO BEARS!
1. Jeff Tedford is God
2. We Believe in Jeff Tedford
3. We Believe in Cal Football
4. We Believe Jim Harbaugh is Nuts
5. along with Stanfurd
cause.mission: to carry the Golden Bears to a date with destiny.
cause.name: California Golden Bears to Rose Bowl
